A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like: After my second viewing I can comfortably say this film is amazing. It had a monumentally difficult task of moving the Star Wars movies into new territory. Honoring the past while blazing a new path forward and it succeeded without question. The Force Awakens was a very good movie but it mainly honored the past and did little to establish a new era of storytelling in the Star Wars Universe. This movie did just that and then some. It felt shocking and turned the Star Wars Universe on its head but also felt new and fresh while still feeling like it belonged in the Star Wars Saga. Genuinely impressive\, I can't wait to see where it goes from here.
